駩字的基本解释

駩
quán
黑嘴白毛的马。

駩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quān］
［《廣韻》此緣切，平仙，清。］
亦作“騡1”。
白马黑唇。

駩字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駩； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1437第31
【廣韻】此緣切【集韻】【韻會】逡緣切【正韻】且緣切，?音詮。【玉篇】白馬黑脣。　又【集韻】從緣切，音全。義同。亦作騡。

駩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
駩字的起名意思

暂无。

駩
Basic explanation of words
駩
quán
Black-mouthed and white-haired horse.
駩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quān］
["Guangyun" this edge cut, Pingxian, Qing. ]
Also known as "騡1".
White horse black lips.
駩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　駩; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1437 31
[Guang Yun] This edge cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] The edge cut [Zheng Yun] and the edge cut, the sound interpretation. [Jade articles] White horse and black lips.　[Jiyun] Cut from the edge, full sound. The same meaning. Also used as 騡.

сущ. * белая лошадь с чёрными губами
